ch0132_90_adeku/0101_0701_02_10:
How’s training going? I’d love to see how
much you’ve grown!
ch0132_90_adeku/7101_0701_01_10:
I never thought I’d wield such power at this
stage of my life.
ch0132_90_adeku/7101_0701_02_10: In truth, I’m more surprised than anyone.
ch0132_90_adeku/7101_0701_03_10: You never know what life has in store!
ch0132_90_adeku/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve always asked others what they plan to
do with their newfound power.
ch0132_90_adeku/7102_0701_02_10:
But now, I’m asking myself the same
question!
ch0132_90_adeku/7103_0701_01_10:
Ever since I awakened my arc suit,
Benga’s been begging me to train
with him even more.
ch0132_90_adeku/7103_0701_02_10:
I think seeing Lance and me accomplish what
we have inspired him to set his sights higher.
ch0132_90_adeku/7103_0701_03_10: He really is a grandson worth training!
ch0132_90_adeku/7104_0701_01_10:
So much has happened since I first became
a Trainer.
ch0132_90_adeku/7104_0701_03_10:
But everything has shaped me into who I am
today—and who I’ll be from this moment on!
ch0132_90_adeku/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you feel connected to your Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0132_90_adeku/7105_0701_02_10:
Both Trainers and Pokémon grow stronger
together through each other’s company.
ch0132_90_adeku/7105_0701_03_10:
Don’t forget about the needs of the Pokémon
at your side!
ch0132_90_adeku/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! There’s something I want
to give you.
ch0132_90_adeku/1701_0702_01_10: Learn from everything! And keep growing!
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0701_01_10: I want to share a message with others.
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0701_02_10:
No matter how old you get, there are always
new things to discover and ways to grow.
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0701_03_10:
As a mentor, I hope to pass this lesson on
to those who come after me, especially those
who struggle with the passage of time.
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0702_01_10:
As you get older, watching younger people
grow and progress, you might worry about
falling behind.
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0702_03_10:
The fear of being left behind can motivate
you to keep growing!
ch0132_90_adeku/2501_0702_04_10:
Life is an endless journey—and that’s what
makes it interesting!
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0701_01_10: Pokémon teach us a lot just by being with us.
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0701_02_10:
And not just about battling—they help us
uncover new possibilities and aspects of
ourselves we never knew existed.
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0701_03_10:
I can’t imagine a world without Pokémon by
my side.
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0702_01_10:
Have you ever imagined what the world
would be like without Pokémon by your side?
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0702_02_10:
A world where people and Pokémon live
apart would be sad indeed.
ch0132_90_adeku/2511_0702_03_10: I’m grateful to live in this world, just as it is.
ch0132_90_adeku/3001_0701_01_10:
You got a commendably early start! Shall I help
you with your training?
ch0132_90_adeku/3003_0701_01_10:
Running around all day will exhaust both you and
your Pokémon. Why don’t you rest a bit?
ch0132_90_adeku/3005_0701_01_10:
You’ve worked hard all day. Now be sure to show
your Pokémon some kindness.
